snippet: For two decades, Ed Templeton amassed a vast, loosely knit collection of photographs during his travels as a professional skateboarder and artist, which he assembled into “Wayward Cognitions,” out this October.
abstract: For two decades, Ed Templeton amassed a vast, loosely knit collection of photographs during his travels as a professional skateboarder and artist, which he assembled into “Wayward Cognitions,” out this October.

headline.main: A First Look at a Street Photographer's New Book, 20 Years in the Making
